name: Calculus I
snippet: Limits, derivatives, and applications to motion and optimization, with emphasis on problem-solving.

reviews.body: Fair workload. Exams focused on conceptual understanding. Weekly quizzes.

name: Programming II
snippet: Data structures and object-oriented programming in Java. Projects emphasize design and testing.

name: Principles of Microeconomics
snippet: Supply, demand, and market structures. Lots of graphs; lectures recorded.

name: Data Science Modeling I
snippet: Python-based introduction to data science and statistical modeling.

name: General Physics
snippet: Mechanics and waves with a calculus foundation; labs every week.

name: Programming I
snippet: Intro to programming concepts; language varies by instructor.

name: General Chemistry I
snippet: Atoms, molecules, reactions, and stoichiometry. Heavy lab component.

name: Data and Algorithms: Ethics & Policy
snippet: Covers fairness, accountability, and transparency in algorithmic systems.

name: Principles of Macroeconomics
snippet: National income, inflation, unemployment, fiscal and monetary policy.
